title: Canada Records All-Time High Temperature of 115 Degrees F During Terrifying Heatwave
content:
1. Canada Records All-Time High Temperature of 115 Degrees F During Terrifying Heatwave  The Daily Beast
  2. Canada records highest temperature ever amid heat wave  Fox News
  3. Western Canada heat wave scorches BC's crops, shatters records  Global News
  4. Canada sets record temperature of over 114 degrees amid heat wave, forecasts of even hotter weather  The Washington Post
  5. Record heat wave hits Western Canada  CBC News: The National
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
